original_title: Electromotive - The Story of ARP Instruments
overview: Electromotive is the definitive documentary charting the rise and demise of one of the worldâ€™s most influential and pioneering synth companies. It dives deep into the world of ARP and their instruments, with fascinating insights from those involved, copious amounts of previously undocumented information, and then debunks many myths. A triumph, a true labour of love and essential viewing for any synth nerd.
title: Electromotive - The Story of ARP Instruments
